# Choose Destiny (Spell)
## Overview
[[Divination Spells|Divination]]

**Level:** [[Destiny (Domain)|Destiny 9]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 19th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 19]]

**Casting Time:** 1 swift action

**Components:** V

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Races of Destiny (WotC), pg. 164

You gain a limited ability to discern a successful path for your actions. For the duration of the spell, any time you make an attack roll, skill check, ability check, or saving throw, you may roll twice and select which die roll to use.
